item.name: Get user permissions lists for CRUD

body.raw:
{
    "name": "testing broadcast user data",
    "sendDate": "2022-09-01",       
    "mailingListId": "6303157e3d6d888ca85a6277",
    "sendMethod": [
        "email",
        "inbox"
    ],
    "sendDomain": "support@realestateu.com",
    "mailSubject": "{{firstName}} you received a broadcast",
    "mailPreHeader": "Hello, {{firstName}} {{lastName}}. Greetings from RealEstateU.",
    "mailBody": "{{firstName}}, help us pick our new logo.",
    "dynamicKeys": [
        "firstName",
        "lastName"
    ]
}
